channel.title: [317] Gliding with GS [317]
channel.description:
How do I stop gliding with a godsword, you glide when you run with it...
How do I stop it?
If you helped thank-you very very much.

item.title: [317] Gliding with GS [317]
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

change whats after then “=”.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Gliding with GS [317]
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

I don’t get it, do I change all the numbers after anIntArray355 like anIntArray355[0] = 1; and anIntArray355[1] = 1; , or do I just change one number like anIntarray355[1] = 1; and leave the rest? Because theres like 31 anIntArray355[1-31] = 0; …

[center]Simplify

anIntArray355[0] = 0; TO anIntArray355[0] = 1;

anIntArray355[1] = 0; TO anIntArray355[1] = 1;

ETC[/center]

NVM I get it know, I was making it slower not faster, I changed all the numbers to -1, know it’s all good. Thank-you!

Read full topic
